title: Notifications
subtitle: Here, you will find all the notifications sent by the organisation. You can filter them by Fiscal Code, IUN Code, send date and status.

errors.iun: Please enter a valid IUN code

payment.title: Payments
payment.subtitle-single: Here, you can track the payment status of the pagoPA alerts attached to the notification.
payment.subtitle-single-f24: Here, you can see the F24 forms attached to the notification.
payment.subtitle-multiple: To see the payment status of the pagoPA alerts attached to the notification, select a recipient.
payment.subtitle-multiple-f24: To see the F24 forms attached to the notification, select a recipient.
payment.f24-dialog-title: F24 forms attached to the notification {{iun}}

empty-state.filtered: We couldn't find any results: try different filters. <0>Remove filters</0>.
empty-state.no-notifications: The agency has not yet sent any notifications. Use the <0>API Keys</0> or do a <1>manual sending</1>.

detail.document-not-available: The document will be downloadable in a few minutes. You can try again by reloading the page or clicking on the link of the requested document
detail.alert-cancellation-in-progress: The sending entity has requested the cancellation of this notification. Your status will be updated at the end of the cancellation process.
detail.alert-cancellation-confirmed: This notification has been cancelled by the sending entity. Recipients will no longer be able to download the attached documents or the certificates enforceable against third parties.

cancel-notification-modal.notification-cancelled-successfully: Your cancellation request has been accepted.
cancel-notification-modal.title: Do you want to cancel the notification?
cancel-notification-modal.message: Recipients will no longer be able to download the attached documents or the certificates enforceable against third parties. The operation is irreversible.
cancel-notification-modal.message-with-payment: By cancelling the notification, you declare that you are aware that any reimbursement activity in favour of the recipients remains the responsibility of the sending organisation.

generic_error.message: An error occurred while cancelling. Please try again.

detail.download-message-available: Documents are available online for 120 days from the completion of the notification.
detail.download-message-expired: As 120 days have passed since the completion date, the documents are no longer available.
detail.download-aar-available: The acknowledgement of receipt is available online for 10 years from the completion of the notification.
detail.download-aar-expired: As 10 years have passed since the completion date, the acknowledgement of receipt is no longer available.
detail.download-files-link: When do I complete a notification?
